Package bto.controller.project

Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
bto.controller.project.ProjectController
public class ProjectController extends Object
A controller class for project operations.

    • canRegisterProjects

      public static List<Project> canRegisterProjects(HDBOfficer officer)
      Returns the list of projects that the officer can register for (i.e., not already assigned, not registered, and not an applicant).
      Parameters:
      officer - the HDB officer
      Returns:
      a list of projects the officer can register for

    • getApplicantProjects

      public static List<Project> getApplicantProjects(Applicant applicant)
      Returns the list of projects visible and available for the applicant to apply, based on their marital status.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant
      Returns:
      a list of projects the applicant can see and apply for

    • getApplicantActiveProject

      public static Map<Project,ProjectStatus> getApplicantActiveProject(Applicant applicant)
      Returns the active project (if any) that the applicant has applied for, along with its status.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant
      Returns:
      a map containing the project and its status, or null if none found

    • findProjectByName

      public static Project findProjectByName(String projectName)
      Finds and returns a project by its name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project
      Returns:
      the project with the specified name, or null if not found

    • displayProjectDetails

      public static void displayProjectDetails(Project project)
      Displays all details of the specified project in a formatted manner.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to display details for

    • createProject

      public static void createProject(String projectName, String neighbourhood, float priceOne, int numberOfUnitsOne, float priceTwo, int numberOfUnitsTwo, String openingDate, String closingDate, HDBManager manager, int officerSlots) throws Exception
      Creates a new project and adds it to the list if the manager is eligible.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project
      neighbourhood - the neighbourhood of the project
      priceOne - the price of the 2-room housing type
      numberOfUnitsOne - the number of units for the 2-room housing type
      priceTwo - the price of the 3-room housing type
      numberOfUnitsTwo - the number of units for the 3-room housing type
      openingDate - the opening date (format: yyyy-MM-dd)
      closingDate - the closing date (format: yyyy-MM-dd)
      manager - the manager for the project
      officerSlots - the number of officer slots
      Throws:
      Exception - if the manager is not eligible to handle the project

    • deleteProject

      public static void deleteProject(Project project)
      Deletes the specified project from the list.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to delete

    • isProjectVisible

      public static boolean isProjectVisible(Project project)
      Checks if the specified project is visible to applicants.
      Parameters:
      project - the project
      Returns:
      true if the project is visible, false otherwise

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      public static void toggleProjectVisibility(Project project)
      Toggles the visibility of the specified project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project

    • getApplicationsByStatus

      public static Map<Applicant,ProjectStatus> getApplicationsByStatus(Project project, ProjectStatus status)
      Returns a map of applicants with the specified status for the given project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project
      status - the status to filter by
      Returns:
      a map of applicants and their status matching the given status
